description: Since the Taliban took power 2021, Afghanistan has not been invited to big climate conferences. And money for projects addressing climate-related issues has been frozen. Are things about to change?
title: For the first time ever, Taliban reps were invited to the big U.N. climate conference

description: It has been over a thousand days since Russia began it's full-scale invasion of Ukraine. The war has had huge geopolitical ramifications, but it has also has affected the lives of millions of ordinary people. Our correspondent in Kyiv tells us how the one couple in Ukraine has weathered the conflict.
title: A Relationship Surviving 1,000 Days of War

description: In a civil lawsuit this spring, the actor's former girlfriend alleged a "pattern of pervasive domestic abuse" in addition to defamation. Her legal team said the suit has been settled.
title: Jonathan Majors and ex-girlfriend Grace Jabbari settle assault and defamation case

description: Nearly half a dozen institutions of higher education announced plans this week to make tuition free for undergraduates whose families make below a certain income threshold, starting in fall 2025.
title: University of Texas, MIT and others announce free tuition for some undergraduates

description: The decision to indefinitely adjourn next week's sentencing date comes several days after both lawyers agreed that a stay would help sort out unprecedented legal questions.
title: Judge indefinitely postpones sentencing in Trump's hush money case

description: The celebrity doctor recently held investments worth tens of millions of dollars in health care, tech, and food companies which could pose significant conflicts of interest.
title: TV's Dr. Oz invested in businesses regulated by the agency Trump wants him to run

description: Creating a census of the dung beetles of Massachusetts gives clues into the health of forests and fields.
title: Searching for tiny dung beetles that clean the vast forest floor

description: President-elect Donald Trump picks Pam Bondi as attorney general after Matt Gaetz withdraws from consideration. And, Putin says Russia tested a new intermediate-range ballistic missile on Ukraine.
title: Trump's new pick for attorney general. And, Russia's message to NATO countries

description: At the Pittsburgh Sword Fighters club, members are asked to leave their politics at the door, a rule that has led to closer relationships and more learning from one another.
title: You can sword-fight at this club. But no politics allowed

description: As a new Trump administration signals a retreat on climate action, China is stepping up. China is the biggest producer of climate technologies like electric vehicles and solar panels.
title: How will China impact the future of climate change? You might be surprised

description: Michel Martin asks former Google CEO Eric Schmidt about the government's move to separate Google from its Chrome browser and the future of artificial intelligence as envisioned in the book "Genesis."
title: Former Google CEO Eric Schmidt discusses the DOJ move to have Google sell off Chrome

description: The resolution comes after the agency said Iran has defied demands to rein in its nuclear program and has increased its stockpile of uranium enriched to near weapons-grade levels.
title: United Nations nuclear agency again condemns Iran for failing to fully cooperate

description: An Alabama man convicted in the 1994 killing of a hitchhiker cursed at the prison warden shortly before he was put to death Thursday evening in the nation's third execution using nitrogen gas.
title: Alabama carries out nation's 3rd nitrogen gas execution
